org.icechamps.lava.util

Class Lookup<K extends java.lang.Comparable<? super K>,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.icechamps.lava.util.Lookup<K,V>
  • Type Parameters:
    K - The type of the key
    V - The type of the value

    public class Lookup<K extends java.lang.Comparable<? super K>,V>
extends java.lang.Object
    A helper class for the join operation. This provides a way to lookup groups of results based on a common key

      • createForJoin

        public static <K extends java.lang.Comparable<? super K>,V> Lookup<K,V> createForJoin(java.util.Collection<V> collection,
                                                                      Func<V,K> func,
                                                                      java.util.Comparator<K> keyComparator)
        Constructor method that takes in a collection and a callback function. It then populates the internal group structure with the results of the callback
        Parameters:
        collection - The source collection
        func - The callback function used to generate the keys
        keyComparator - A comparator that is used to compare the keys. If it is null, a default "==" is used

      • getGroupForKey

        public Group<K,V> getGroupForKey(K key,
                        boolean createNew)
        Looks up a group based on the given key. If createNew is true, we create a new Group using the given key.
        Parameters:
        key - The key used in the lookup
        createNew - Should we create a new Group if it wasn't found?
        Returns:
        Either the existing Group, a new Group, or null.

      • applyResultFunction

        public <Result> java.util.Collection<Result> applyResultFunction(Func2<K,java.util.Collection<V>,Result> resultFunc)
        Applys a transformation function on the groups in this lookup.
        Type Parameters:
        Result - The type of object each group is transformed into
        Parameters:
        resultFunc - The function that transforms the groups in this lookup into a single object
        Returns:
        An Enumerable instance containing the transformed results of each group

      • getGroups

        public java.util.ArrayList<Group<K,V>> getGroups()
